reference-code.description: Sub for ANAT PHYSIO 2000350. Job Preparatory Program substitutions for Anatomy and Physiology
Ninth Grader. A student below the ninth grade has been declared a ninth grade student for this cours
Gifted. The course section is entirely composed of gifted students.
Honors. This is a course identified as “Honors” in the state Course Code Directory
Include. Include in grade point average (used only in combination with an “X”).
No Credit. No credit awarded - per district policy
Transferred. Credit transferred from an out-of-state school or nonpublic school by equating of crs
Exclude from State GPA. Exclude from State GPA, but include in District GPA
Exclude from state and local grade point average
